definition: hair/feather/down/wool/mildew/mold/coarse or semifinished/young/raw/careless/unthinking/nervous/scared/(of currency) to devalue or depreciate/classifier for Chinese fractional monetary unit ( = 角[jiao3] , = one-tenth of a yuan or 10 fen 分[fen1])
a prayer mat/a carpet for kneeling

sentences.english: They are made of the needled ceramic fibre blanket.
sentences.chinese: 由陶瓷纤维针刺毯加工而成。

sentences.english: And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of Temani reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 约巴死了，毯螅地的人户珊接续他作王。

sentences.english: The grass turns itself into a magnificent jade.
sentences.chinese: 草儿有了你，聚集成翡翠般的毯。

sentences.english: Ceramic fiber module is made of folded and compressed spun ceramic fiber blanket.
sentences.chinese: 陶瓷纤维模块，利用硅酸铝陶瓷纤维毯经压缩制成。

sentences.english: In effect, cell phones have become this generation's security blanket.
sentences.chinese: 研究结论是，手机已经成为这一代人的保护毯。

sentences.english: And when Jobab was dead, Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in his stead.
sentences.chinese: 约巴死了，毯螅地的人户珊接续他作王。

sentences.english: I will send fire upon Teman that will consume the fortresses of Bozrah.
sentences.chinese: 我却要降火在毯螅，烧灭波斯拉的宫殿。

sentences.english: You want to sleep. Warm sheets and blankets enfold you.
sentences.chinese: 想睡觉了，温暖的被毯就包裹在身。

sentences.english: Pete Wentz, Andy Hurley, Patrick Stump and Joe Trohman of Fall Out Boy pose for a red-carpet photo.
sentences.chinese: 皮特温兹，安迪赫尔利，帕特里克树桩和乔走红毯。

sentences.english: The rug is a gift heisproudto display.
sentences.chinese: 熊皮毯是他一件引以自豪的礼物。

sentences.english: He took up the rug , to celebrate their diligence and taste.
sentences.chinese: 他拿过沙发毯，夸奖了她们的勤奋和雅兴。

sentences.english: Nostalgia is an emotional comfort blanket, but it is also an illusion .
sentences.chinese: 怀旧是一床抚慰情绪的“安心毯”，但也是一种假象。

sentences.english: But I will send a fire upon Teman, which shall devour the palaces of Bozrah.
sentences.chinese: 我却要降火在毯螅，烧灭波斯拉的宫殿。

definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known
